name: linkedin-shortcuts
tagline: Userscript for keyboard shortcuts on LinkedIn.com
body:
### Description
This is a userscript using TamperMonkey on Google Chrome to bind Keyboard Shortcuts for [LinkedIn](http://linkedin.com).

### Installation Steps (for Google Chrome)
1. Add [TamperMonkey](http://bit.ly/12bWG6v) to Chrome
2. Click to install the [linkedin-shortcuts userscript](http://bit.ly/1346q6d)

### Keyboard Shortcuts
|Key | Function |
| ------------- | ------------- |
| Alt + \	| Help (Pop-up) |
| Alt + /	| Main Search Box |
| Alt + h	| Navigate to Homepage |
| Alt + p	| Navigate to Profile Page |
| Alt + i	| Navigate to Invitations Page |
| Alt + m	| Navigate to Messages Page |
| Alt + c	| Navigate to Contacts Page |
| Alt + w	| Navigate to Who's View My Profile Page |
| Alt + k	| Navigate to People You May Know Page |
| Alt + [1-5]	| Navigate to Search Result # |

### UserScript Details
```
// @name       linkedin-shortcuts
// @namespace  http://danielfrancis.net/
// @version    0.1
// @description  Useful keyboard shortcuts for LinkedIn
// @match      http://www.linkedin.com/*
// @copyright  6-17-2013, Daniel Francis
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
